name: Gobring
culture_notes: Riveric Dialect dominant; Coastal Tongue loanwords
Diet: smoked riverfish and marsh tubers
constraints: ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
no instant resurrection or life-replacement magics
limited combustion industry; no high-pressure steam
notes: Small outpost at narrow river ford near tidal marsh
Transient population of ferrymen, ritual apprentices, and traders
